actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the project for Atlantic Intracoastal Waterway bridges, Virginia and North Carolina.

summary.text: Stipulates that the first costs of all bridge construction for the Atlantic Intracoastal Waterway Bridges project in North Carolina and Virginia shall be borne by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the project for Atlantic Intracoastal Waterway bridges, Virginia and North Carolina.
